content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs a system, I received a browse_website command from you and opened the website https://www.nhm.ac.uk/discover/octopuses-keep-surprising-us-here-are-eight-examples-how.html. Octopuses have a range of unique characteristics, including having more than one brain, being seriously clever, using tools, recognising people, having unusual reproductive methods, being self-sacrificing mothers, and having cunning disguises and escape techniques. They are also able to change color and texture to blend in with their surroundings, use ink as a defense mechanism, regenerate limbs, have three hearts, and some have been discovered to build underwater cities. Octopus blood is blue due to the presence of copper-based protein. \n\nYou generated an image of an octopus and saved it to disk:/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/0ba31036-257a-47ab-b4e7-ad410c4f7829.jpg. You also wrote the website URL to a file named octopus_urls.txt.\n\nCommand write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.\n\nI then received a command from you to read the file octopus_urls.txt. Command read_file returned: https://www.nhm.ac.uk/discover/octopuses-keep-surprising-us-here-are-eight-examples-how.html. You also sent a command to get hyperlinks from the website.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Failure: command get_hyperlinks returned too much output.                         Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.nhm.ac.uk/discover/octopuses-keep-surprising-us-here-are-eight-examples-how.html", "question": "What are some additional unique characteristics of octopuses?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Additional unique characteristics of octopuses include the ability to change color and texture, regenerate limbs, squirt ink as a defense mechanism, have blue blood due to the copper-based protein haemocyanin, and have three hearts. The supposedly solitary gloomy octopus was also found to build underwater cities and exhibit aggression in densely populated settlements. \n \n Links: ['cookies (https://www.nhm.ac.uk/about-us/cookies-on-the-museums-website.html)', 'Manage my preferences (https://www.nhm.ac.uk/about-us/cookie-preferences.html)', 'Skip to content (https://www.nhm.ac.uk/discover/octopuses-keep-surprising-us-here-are-eight-examples-how.html#main-content)', ' (https://www.nhm.ac.uk/)', '\\n\\t\\t\\t\\t\\t\\tVisit\\n\\t\\t\\t\\t\\t (https://www.nhm.ac.uk/visit.html)']"}]
"""
